feature.label: FITTEST ITE Core
feature.description:
This feature is the core feature of the FITTEST ITE. -------------------------- Change logs: v1.8.1: - link editor vs navigator - activate control view
v1.8.0: - allinone control view - project configuration edit
v1.7.2: - filter core components to be included in this feature - separate Focus, ConTest to additional features -------------------------- v1.7.1: -embeds the netx tool to make it available from the HTTP server -embeds the PHP part of the PHP logging component to make it available from the HTTP server -adds transform tools to convert PHP logs into final state machines -adds different algorithms to generate abstract test cases -fixes issue #56 related to space in path -------------------------- v1.7.0: -integrates PHP logger -integrates ConTest Optimizer -adds batched CTE to Selenium test cases generation -adds embedded FITTEST agent -FITTEST projects are now Java projects too -many other fixes and improvements! -------------------------- v1.6.0: -integrates IBM FoCuS -integrates UU's ASLI tool -integrates PHP logger (beta) -fixes tickets #20, #21, #22, #23 -improves agents GUI -------------------------- v1.4.0: -adds generation of test cases without requiring Berner && Mattner CTE XL tool -add support of Linux 32bits and 64bits -plugins are signed now -with Selenium-server 2.16.1 inside v1.3.0 integrates IBM ConTest. This release adds more user feedback when test cases are executed. FITTEST components are now packaged in another plugin because of their huge size, so that updates of FITTEST perspective will be smaller/quicker to download.
